REST API repository Logout¶

async src.repository.logout.add_token(token: str | None, db: Session) → int | None¶

Add token to black list

Parameters:

  • token (str | None) – auth_token

  • db (Session) – Database session connection

Returns:

id of added token

Return type:

int | None

async src.repository.logout.check_token(token: str, db: Session) → bool¶

Chack token present on database or no

Parameters:

  • token (str) – auth_token

  • db (Session) – Database session connection

Returns:

True if token is present on database

Return type:

bool

async src.repository.logout.purge_old(db: Session, duration: int = 7) → int¶

_summary_

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Purge old records for expired tokens

  • duration (int, optional) – Day how old token will be purged, defaults to 7

Returns:

How many recods was deleted

Return type:

int
